page.title: 09Education,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: {Education in Sherburn.}In the 17th.century a boys' school was built in Sherburn.Later another school was opened in Kirkgate for the girls and infants.Hungate Junior School opened in 1970 and in 1979 it became a primary school when the former infant school closed.The present school has six classes and is built to an open plan design.The facilities include large playing fields and a heated outdoor pool. Athelstan's school day starts at 9.15 and finishes at 3,30. The age of the children varies from 4 to 11 years. There are nine full time teachers and one head teacher. 279 children attend the school in 9 classrooms. The school is quite new, built in 1979. Our school makes many visits to interesting places, much of the work is based on these visits.
